thread.title: Books: Denver best sellers, 10/18/2015
thread.title_full: Books: Denver best sellers, 10/18/2015 - The Denver Post

author: The Denver Post
title: Books: Denver best sellers, 10/18/2015
text:
The Denver area's best-selling books, according to information from The BoulderBook Store.
FICTION
1. All the Light We Cannot See, by Anthony Doerr
2. Purity, by Jonathan Franzen
3. Fates and Furies, by Lauren Groff
4. Two Years Eight Months and Twenty-Eight Nights, by Salman Rushdie
5. The Girl in the Spider's Web, by David Lagercrantz
6. Go Set a Watchman, by Harper Lee
7. The Heart Goes Last, by Margaret Atwood
8. A Knight of the Seven Kingdoms, by George R. R. Martin
9. The Clasp, by Sloane Crosley
10. In a Dark, Dark Wood, by Ruth Ware
NONFICTION
1. Agents of Babylon, by David Jeremiah
2. Don't Suck, Don't Die, by Kristin Hersh
3. Being Mortal, by Atul Gawande
4. M Train, by Patti Smith
5. Big Magic, by Elizabeth Gilbert
6. How the World Moves, by Peter Nabokov
7. Between the World and Me, by Ta-Nehisi Coates
8. Furiously Happy, by Jenny Lawson
9. Modern Romance, by Aziz Ansari
10. Rising Strong, by Bren√© Brown
PAPERBACK FICTION
